thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: CHRISTA
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by CHRISTA

author: CHRISTA
title: CHRISTA
text: I did a 72h relocation from Melbourne to Adelaide. Checking in was smooth, however, it might have been a bit rushed for a first time renter. Car worked smoothly, without trouble. Returning of the car was smooth, however, Adelaide Airport rental car return terminal does not have signs for Redspot (as they are nowadays Enterprise) neither the return terminal have the rental operators booth. One must go inside the airport terminal to find the Redspot/Enterprise counter.
